channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- NPS computy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- NPS computy

item.title: CVE-2024-1754|2024-08-01T18:48:21.982Z -- unknown -- nps%20computy
item.description: The NPS computy WordPress plugin through 2.7.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-1755|2024-08-01T18:48:21.954Z -- unknown -- nps%20computy
item.description: The NPS computy WordPress plugin through 2.7.5 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-1755|2024-04-15T05:00:04.951Z -- unknown -- nps%20computy
item.description: The NPS computy WordPress plugin through 2.7.5 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks

item.description: The NPS computy WordPress plugin through 2.7.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
